      • getResponseResult

        public static <T extends Result> T getResponseResult(org.opends.server.types.Operation operation,
                                     T result)
                                          throws ErrorResultException
        Populates the result object with the operation details and return the result object if it was successful. Otherwise, it throws an ErrorResultException.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the result object
        Parameters:
        operation - used to populate the result
        result - the result object to populate from the Operation
        Returns:
        the result if successful, an ErrorResultException is thrown otherwise
        Throws:
        ErrorResultException - when an error occurs

      • getResponseResult

        public static Result getResponseResult(org.opends.server.types.Operation operation)
                                throws ErrorResultException
        Converts the OpenDJ server Operation object into an OpenDJ LDAP SDK Result object.
        Parameters:
        operation - value to convert
        Returns:
        the converted value
        Throws:
        ErrorResultException - when an error occurs

      • getResultCode

        public static ResultCode getResultCode(org.opends.server.types.Operation operation)
        Returns the OpenDJ LDAP SDK ResultCode extracted out of the OpenDJ server Operation.
        Parameters:
        operation - value to convert
        Returns:
        the converted value
